name: Up Shore (TheBrownHarsha)
description:
Up Shore

A 2D puzzle platformer where you control both a kid and a mermaid, as they have to work together to overcome obstacles and trials.

This game was made by 8 hard working people from multiple backgrounds and locations for the "My First Game Jam Summer 2018":

Fixc.itch.io - Art 

Furozo.itch.io - Audio

Hitagi.itch.io - Code 

NeonPastelColor.itch.io - Audio

Nobyas.itch.io - Art 

Stubean.itch.io - Code 

TheBrownHarsha.itch.io - Design 

Varunraj.itch.io - Design

Controls:

Mermaid

  • Movement = WASD 
  • Bubble Spawn = F
  • Bubble Reset = C
  • Switch Perspectives = G
  • Pickup Kid = E

Kid

  • Movement = AD
  • Jump = Space Bar
  • Switch Perspectives = G
  • Pickup Mermaid = E
